description:
Sumireko looks after Oto while Adashino is away. They go to Oto`s school where Sumireko revels in the joys of youth. She and Oto run into Uname and spend the evening with her. But their peace is short-lived as the shadow of a new Curiosity draws near.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shitagi to Okashi to Akai Fuku
下着とお菓子と紅い服
